name: Beach Runner (JustCarty)
description:
My first game as a game developer.
In other words, it's terrible.

The premise is simple. You control a character that is running down a beach attempting to destroy sandcastles and dodge rubbish bags.
Simple - right?!
Yeah, it's simple - sorry!

Controls are just WASD, but if you hit the top of the screen then you lose.
And, because I love you all, the controls aren't customisable! ("Can this game get any better??")

This is developed completely by myself (a full stack webdev, who wildly over judged how hard it would be to make a game).
I'm proud of this project, and I apologise that the art is terrible. Like I said, I'm a webdev, we learn as we go!
